thothbot.parallax.core.shared.materials

Class MeshFaceMaterial

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.materials.Material
      • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.materials.MeshFaceMaterial

  • public final class MeshFaceMaterial
extends Material
    A Material to define multiple materials for the same geometry. The geometry decides which material is used for which faces by the faces materialindex. The materialindex corresponds with the index of the material in the materials array.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class thothbot.parallax.core.shared.materials.Material
